room_title: Escape room "Pawn Shop" by MindGames of Mebane in Mebane
room_description:
Tiny’s Pawn Shop, a down-trodden establishment on the edge of town that most folks ignore, holds the key to saving your life.
Billy thought his luck had changed when he found an expensive laptop in the backseat of a cab. He took it to the local pawn shop got a tidy sum. He invited you out for a little celebration. Never one to turn down a good time, you agreed.
Everyone was having fun until the real owner came calling. There was $2 million in stolen uncut diamonds hidden inside the laptop. Now, Billy is counting on your particular skills to get the diamonds back. We can get you in there. You have one hour to find the diamonds and get out… Or else!
